item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:49 UTC – Details)

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 2, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ LMXXVJ
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BNJHPYD

High Quality Material: This Women’s Jewellery Set is made of White Gold Plated ,Main stone is Created Blue Sapphire ,Side stone is White cubic zirconia. High Polished. Nickel-free, Hypoallergenic and Shiny Forever. Will not change the color, health and environmental protection.
Adjustable Size: Necklace length: 17.71″+1.97″, Bracelet Length: 7.09″+0.79″,Ring Size :Adjustable . We specially add extension chains for necklaces and bracelets, So that different sizes can be applied, Necklaces and Pendants can be separated, You can change the necklace you like.
Special Occasion Accessories:These wedding jewelry sets are Stunning and Elegant, Suitable for Wedding-Engagement-Party-Ball-Prom-Pageant-Cocktail-Date Night.Come with a nice gift box and a jewelry pouch, It’s a perfect gift for your Lovers, Mother, Daughter, Sister, Wife, Fiancee, Couple, Friends or Yourself on Anniversary-Valentines Day-Birthday-Christmas-Xmas Day.
Protection and Service: Please stay away from chemicals and keep the accessories dry. The product will always stay shiny. If you have any questions about this product, Please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to promise you a wonderful shopping experience.

About LMXXVJ jewelry

Meet you, Meet love.

An amazing encounter, a lifetime companion.

LMXXVJ has been focusing on fashion jewelry accessories, using high-quality cubic zirconia and semi-precious stones and exquisite craftsmanship to make exquisite jewelry. We hope that our jewelry will bring you good luck and a happy life.

All accessories are made of materials that are harmless to the human body to create a comfortable wearing experience for you.

For more earrings, ear clips, necklaces, bracelets, weddings, dance parties, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day jewelry sets, etc., please enter LMXXVJ STORE.

  • Bracelet Physical Picture

  • Pendant Physical Picture

  • Earrings Physical Picture

  • Adjustable Ring Physical Picture

Read more

Electroplating Process

The product uses five-layer electroplating platinum, which can better protect the health of the product and the user.

Bracelet Extension Clasp

All bracelets are equipped with a 0.79″ extension buckle, which can fit different sizes of wrists.

Necklace extension chain

Each necklace and pendant can be disassembled. You can change the necklace yourself, and the necklace adds a 1.97″ extension chain, which is convenient for users to match different clothes.

Read more

  • Every stone, Has every story.

LMXXVJ uses AAAAA grade cubic zirconia. Each stone is polished by experienced craftsmen. Each stone is specially selected to show the perfect cut surface, just to give you the best blessings.

  • Best Birthstone Gifts

Christmas, New Year’s Day, Women’s Day, Mother’s Day, Club Night, Valentine’s Day, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Events, Prom, Cocktail Party, Mitzvah, Prom, Festival, etc. Best for luxury jewelry with wedding dresses, evening gowns and skirts. Best birthstone gifts.

Read more
